name: Soundscape (itch) (fimbulvetr)
description:
A labyrinth in which you can only use your hearing to navigate.

Pleasure turn on the sound. Best played with headphones.

Made in 48 hours for the 2019 GMTK game jam. Created with RPG Maker MV.

Since the theme of the game jam is "only one", I went with "only one sense", the sense being hearing. This is my very first finished game (unless you count that text adventure I made in third grade). I'd like to expand on the idea - iron out the bugs, add more levels with enemies, treasure chests etc. - but that's a plan for another day. Enjoy!

Sounds by the following users of Freesound.org:
apolloaiello, funwithsound, gregswinford, "Footsteps, Concrete, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk), Kukensius, LittleRobotSoundFactory, ljudman, makemebad, Marnenagel, medialint
